query: Is there any page limit of the short paper
output: Yes, there is a page limit for short papers. At submission time, the short paper needs to fit in 4 pages, but for the camera-ready versions, 5 pages of content will be allowed. Sections like the limitations, ethics statement, acknowledgments, and references do not count against these limits.

query: Can I attend the conference remotely?
output: Yes, you can attend the conference remotely. The conference offers virtual registration, which includes access to all recorded sessions on demand for at least one month following the meeting.

query: Can studnet volunteers register for the conference for free?
output: Yes, student volunteers can register for the conference for free once they have received a Congratulatory email confirming their Volunteer Service Acceptance. They will be provided with a special link for registration where their registration fees are waived.

query: Can I get a full refund if I cancel my registration due to governmental travel restrictions?
output: Yes, you can get a full refund (minus up to a $50 processing fee) if you cancel your registration due to governmental travel restrictions, regardless of when the notification is received by the ACL Office. However, you must submit documentation supporting this cancellation exception.

query: Is there any discounted virtual registration for the conference
output: Yes, there is a discounted virtual registration for the conference. The discounted/sliding scale virtual registration is intended to help researchers who would otherwise be unable to participate. The application form for the discounted and free virtual registration will be available on May 30th.
